Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>ShareApps
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered if you choose to share all apps from the Setup Wizard, and shares all apps based on their persona with the groups configured when setting up communication methods.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered if you choose to share all apps from the Setup Wizard, and shares all apps based on their persona with the groups configured when setting up communication methods.
